text:
Automation Logic | London, UK | DEVOPS ENGINEER | Permanent | ONSITE

Automation Logic is a leading European professional services firm providing consultancy and support to large enterprises in the field of data centre automation. You will deliver hands-on, business-oriented strategic and technical consulting to our clients for cloud infrastructure and data centre automation solutions.

Skillset: Public/Private Cloud, Scripting, Configuration Management, CI/CD, Containers

More about Automation Logic: www.automationlogic.com

Please email me fazan@automationlogic.com if you wish to apply or if you would like some further information.
